Sentencas: The integrated system of a solid oxide fuel cell and molten carbonate fuel cell theoretically has very good potential for power generation with carbon dioxide utilization.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: However, the control strategy of such a system needs to be considered for efficient operation.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: In this paper, a control structure design for an integrated fuel cell system is performed based on economic optimization to select manipulated variables, controlled variables and control configurations.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: The objective (cost) function includes a carbon tax to get an optimal trade-off between power generation and carbon dioxide emission, and constraints include safe operation.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: This study focuses on the top-down economic analysis which is the first part of the design procedure.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: Three actively constrained regions as a function of the main disturbances, namely, the fuel and steam feed rates, are identified; each region represents different sets of active constraints.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: Under nominal operating conditions, the system operates in region I.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis

Sentencas: However, operating the fuel cell system in region I and II can use the same structure, but in region III, a different control structure is required.
Titulo: Control structure design of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell integrated system: Top-down analysis
